name: Suicune & Entei LEGEND

attacks.name: Torrent Blade
attacks.effect: Return 2 {W} Energy attached to Suicune & Entei LEGEND to your hand. Choose 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. This attack does 100 damage to that Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Bursting Inferno
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

rule_box:
Put this card from your hand onto your Bench only with the other half of Suicune & Entei LEGEND.
When this Pokémon has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
